events.name: -No Event-
events.description: This is a null event. There is no need to ever use this in a real trigger.

events.name: Entered by...
events.description: Triggers when an infantry or vehicle enters the attached object. Typically this trigger is attached to a building or a cell.

events.name: Spied upon
events.description: Detects when a spy has entered the attached building.

events.name: Thieved by...
events.description: Triggers when a thief steals money from the specified House.

events.name: Discovered by Player
events.description: Detects when the attached object has been discovered by the Player. Discovered means reavealed from under the shroud.

events.name: House discovered...
events.description: Triggers when the specified House has any of its units or buildings discovered by the Player.

events.name: Attacked by any House
events.description: Triggers when the attached unit is attacked in some manner. Incidental damage or friendly fire does not count.

events.name: Destroyed by any House
events.description: Triggers when the attached object has been destroyed. Destroyed by incidental damage or friendly fire doesn't count.

events.name: Any Event
events.description: When used alone%1 it will force the trigger to spring immediately.

events.name: Destroyed%1 Units%1 All...
events.description: Triggers when all units of the specified House have been destroyed. Typically used for end of game conditions.

events.name: Destroyed%1 Buildings%1 All...
events.description: Triggers when all buildings of the specified House have been destroyed. Typically used for end of game conditions.

events.name: Destroyed%1 All...
events.description: Triggers when all objects owned by the specified House have been destroyed. This is the normal (destroy everyone) trigger condition for end of game.

events.name: Credits exceed...
events.description: Triggers when the credit total of the trigger's owning House exceeds this specified amount.

events.name: Elapsed Time...
events.description: Triggers when the elapsed time has expired. This time is initialized when the trigger is created. Timer is reset whenever trigger is sprung when trigger is 'persistant'.

events.name: Global Mission Timer expired
events.description: Triggers when the Global Mission Timer as displayed on the screen has reached zero.

events.name: Destroyed%1 Buildings%1 #...
events.description: Triggers when the number of buildings%1 owned by the trigger's owning House%1 have been destroyed.

events.name: Destroyed%1 Units%1 #...
events.description: Triggers when the number of units%1 owned by the trigger's owning House%1 have been destroyed.

events.name: No Factories left
events.description: Triggers when there are no factories left for the trigger's owning House.

events.name: Civilians evacuated
events.description: Triggers when civilians have been evacuated/left the map.

events.name: Build Building Type...
events.description: When the trigger's owning House builds the building type specified%1 then this event will spring.

events.name: Build Unit Type...
events.description: When the trigger's owning House builds the unit type specified%1 then this event will spring.

events.name: Build Infantry Type...
events.description: When the trigger's owning House builds the infantry type specified%1 then this event will spring.

events.name: Build Aircraft Type...
events.description: When the trigger's owning House builds the aircraft type specified%1 then this event will spring.

events.name: Team leaves map...
events.description: Triggers when the specified team leaves the map. If the team is destroyed%1 it won't trigger. If all but one member is destroyed and that last member leaves the map%1 it will spring.

events.name: Zone Entry by...
events.description: Triggers when a unit of the specified House enters the same zone that this trigger is located in. This trigger must be located in a cell and only a cell.

events.name: Crosses Horizontal Line...
events.description: Triggers when a unit of the specified House crosses the horizontal line as indicated by the location of this trigger. This trigger must be placed in a cell.

events.name: Crosses Vertical Line...
events.description: Triggers when a unit of the specified House crosses the vertical line as indicated by the location of this trigger. This trigger must be placed in a cell.

events.name: Global is set...
events.description: Triggers when the specifed global%1 as defined in Globals.ini%1 is turned on.

events.name: Global is clear...
events.description: Triggers when the specified global%1 as defined in Globals.ini%1 is turned off.

events.name: Destroyed by anything (doesn't infiltrate)
events.description: Triggers when attached object is destroyed%1 but not if it removed because it infiltrates a building/unit.

events.name: Low Power for House...
events.description: Triggers when the specified House's power falls below 100% level.

events.name: Bridge destroyed
events.description: Triggers when the attached bridge is destroyed. A bridge is considered destroyed when an impassable gap is created in the bridge. Place this trigger in a cell under the bridge.

events.name: Building exists...
events.description: Triggers when the specified building%1 owned by the trigger's owning House%1 exists on the map. This works for buildings that are preexisting or constructed by deploying.

events.name: Selected by Player
events.description: Triggers when the attached unit is selected by the Player. Use in single-player only.

events.name: Comes near Waypoint...
events.description: Triggers when the object comes near the specified Waypoint.

events.name: Enemy in Spotlight
events.description: Triggers when an enemy unit enters the spotlight cast by the attached building.

events.name: Local is set...
events.description: Triggers when the specifed local is turned on.

events.name: Local is clear...
events.description: Triggers when the specified local is turned off.

events.name: First damaged (combat only)
events.description: Triggers when first suffering from combat damage from combat damage only.

events.name: Half health (combat only)
events.description: Triggers when damaged to half health >from combat damage only.

events.name: Quarter health (combat only)
events.description: Triggers when damaged to quarter health from combat damage only.

events.name: First damaged (any source)
events.description: Triggers when first suffering from combat damage from any source.

events.name: Half health (any source)
events.description: Triggers when damaged to half health >from any source.

events.name: Quarter health (any source)
events.description: Triggers when damaged to quarter health from any source.

events.name: Attacked by House...
events.description: Triggers when attached object is attacked by some unit of the specified House.

events.name: Ambient light <=...
events.description: Triggers when the ambient light drops below a certain level. Use numbers between 0 and 100.

events.name: Ambient light >=...
events.description: Triggers when the ambient light rises above a certain level. Use numbers between 0 and 100.

events.name: Elapsed Scenario Time...
events.description: When time has elapsed since start of scenario.

events.name: Destroyed by anything
events.description: Triggers when destroyed by anything what-so-ever.

events.name: Goodie Crate picked
events.description: When Crate is picked up by the object the trigger is attached to.

events.name: Goodie Crate picked by anyone
events.description: When Crate is picked up by any unit.

events.name: Random delay...
events.description: Delays a random time between 50 and 150 percent of time specified.

events.name: Credits below...
events.description: Triggers when the trigger's owning House's credit total is below this specified amount.

events.name: Spy entering as House...
events.description: Triggers if a spy disguised as House specified enters the attached object.

events.name: Spy entering as Infantry...
events.description: Triggers if a spy disguised as this type of infantry enters the attached object.

events.name: Destroyed all Naval Units of House...
events.description: Triggers when all naval units of the specified House have been destroyed. Typically used for end of game conditions.

events.name: Destroyed all Land Units of House...
events.description: Triggers when all land units of the specified House have been destroyed. Typically used for end of game conditions.

events.name: Building does not exist...
events.description: Triggers when the specified building%1 owned by the House of this trigger%1  does not exist on the map.

events.name: Full Power for House...
events.description: Triggers if the specified House's power is at 100% level.

events.name: Entered or overflown by...
events.description: Triggers when the specified House's unit%1 infantry%1 or aircraft move over this cell.

events.name: TechType exists%1 #...
events.description: True if there are at least this many of this type%1 belonging to anyone.

events.name: TechType does not exist...
events.description: True if there are none of these on the map at all. Number doesn't mean anything.

events.name: Under EMP
events.description: Triggers when the attached object is disabled by EMP.

events.name: Under EMP by House...
events.description: Triggers when the attached object is disabled by EMP by the specified House.

events.name: EMP removed
events.description: Triggers when the attached object's EMP is removed by a negative duration EMP effect.

events.name: EMP removed by House...
events.description: Triggers when the attached object's EMP is removed by a negative duration EMP effect by the specified House.

events.name: Enemy in Spotlight currently
events.description: Triggers when an enemy unit is currently in the spotlight cast by the attached building.

events.name: Driver killed
events.description: Triggers when the driver of the attached object has been killed.

events.name: Driver killed by House...
events.description: Triggers when the driver of the attached object has been killed by the specified House.

events.name: Vehicle taken
events.description: Triggers when a driver or vehicle thief enters the attached object.

events.name: Vehicle taken by House...
events.description: Triggers when a driver or vehicle thief of the specified House enters the attached object.

events.name: Abducted
events.description: Triggers when the attached object is abducted by anyone.

events.name: Abducted by House...
events.description: Triggers when the attached object is abducted by the specified House.

events.name: Abducts something
events.description: Triggers when the attached object abducts something.

events.name: Abducts something of House...
events.description: Triggers when the attached object abducts something of the specified House.

events.name: Superweapon activated...
events.description: Triggers when the trigger's owning House fires the specified Superweapon.

events.name: Superweapon deactivated...
events.description: Triggers when the trigger's owning House deactivates the specified Superweapon.

events.name: Superweapon activated near Waypoint...
events.description: Triggers when the specified Superweapon is used near the Waypoint.

events.name: TechType reverse engineered...
events.description: Triggers while the trigger's owning House has access to reverse engineered TechType. Number doesn't mean anything.

events.name: Reverse engineers anything
events.description: Triggers when the attached building successfully reverse engineers any TechType.

events.name: Reverse engineers TechType...
events.description: Triggers when the attached building successfully reverse engineers specific TechType. Number doesn't mean anything.

events.name: House owns TechType%1 #...
events.description: Triggers while the trigger's owning House has at least this many of the specified TechType.

events.name: House owns TechType%1 less than #...
events.description: Triggers while the trigger's owning House has no more than this many of the specified TechType.

events.name: Attacked or destroyed by anything
events.description: Triggers when the attached object is attacked or destroyed by absolutely anything.

events.name: Attacked or destroyed by House...
events.description: Triggers when the attached object is attacked or destroyed by the specified House.

events.name: Destroyed by House...
events.description: Triggers when the attached object is destroyed by the specified House.

events.name: TechType exists%1 less than #...
events.description: True if there are no more than this many of this type on the map%1 belonging to anyone.

events.name: Destroyed%1 KeepAlive%1 All...
events.description: Triggers when the specified house has no more objects with KeepAlive=yes.

events.name: Destroyed%1 KeepAlive Buildings%1 All...
events.description: Triggers when the specified house has no more buildings with KeepAlive=yes.

actions.name: -No Action-
actions.description: This is a null action. It will do nothing and is equivalent to not having an action at all.

actions.name: Winner is...
actions.description: The winner will be forced to be the House specified. The game will end immediately. Typically%1 the Player's House is specified.

actions.name: Loser is...
actions.description: The loser will be force to be the House specified. The game will end immediately. Typically%1 the Player's House is specified.

actions.name: Production begins...
actions.description: The AI of the specified House will begin production of units and structures.

actions.name: Create Team...
actions.description: Creates a team of the trigger's owning house. The team member are NOT automatically created however%1 they are either built or recruited.

actions.name: Destroy Team...
actions.description: Destroys all instances of the team type specified. The units in those existing teams will remain and be available for recruiting into other teams.

actions.name: All to Hunt...
actions.description: Forces all units%1 of the specified House%1 into the 'Hunt' mode. They will seek out and destroy their enemies.

actions.name: Reinforcement Team...
actions.description: Create a reinforcement of the specified team. The members of the team WILL be created magically by this action.

actions.name: Drop Zone Flare at Waypoint...
actions.description: Display a drop zone flair at the Waypoint specified. The map will also be revealed around that location.

actions.name: Fire Sale...
actions.description: Cause all buildings of the specified House to be sold. Typically this is used in the final assault by the AI.

actions.name: Play movie and pause...
actions.description: Displays the specified movie on full screen. The game is paused while this occurs and resumes normally after it completes.

actions.name: Text Trigger...
actions.description: Display the text identified by the string file's entry label.

actions.name: Destroy Trigger...
actions.description: Destroy all current instances of the trigger type specified. This does not prevent future instances of that trigger from being created.

actions.name: Autocreate begins...
actions.description: Initiates autocreate for the House specified. This will cause the AI of the specified House to build autocreate teams as it sees fit.

actions.name: Change House...
actions.description: Changes the House of the attached objects to the one specified.

actions.name: Allow Win
actions.description: Removes one 'blockage' from allowing the Player to win. The blockage number is equal the number of triggers created that have this action.

actions.name: Reveal all map
actions.description: Reveals the entire map to the Player. Do NOT use in multiplayer%1 it results in desynchronization.

actions.name: Reveal around Waypoint...
actions.description: Reveals a region of the map to the Player around the Waypoint specified.

actions.name: Reveal zone of Waypoint...
actions.description: Reveals all cells that share the same zone as the waypoing specified. This yields some wierd results. Use with caution.

actions.name: Play Sound Effect...
actions.description: Plays the sound effect specified.

actions.name: Play Music Theme...
actions.description: Plays the music theme specified.

actions.name: Play Speech...
actions.description: Plays the speech sound specified.

actions.name: Force Trigger...
actions.description: Force all triggers of this specified type to spring regardless of what it's event flags may indicate.

actions.name: Timer Start
actions.description: Start the Global Mission Timer.

actions.name: Timer Stop
actions.description: Stop the Global Mission Timer.

actions.name: Timer Extend by...
actions.description: Extend the Global Mission Timer by the time specified.

actions.name: Timer Shorten by...
actions.description: Short the Global Mission Timer by the time specified. It can never be reduced below 0 time.

actions.name: Timer Set...
actions.description: Set the Global Mission Timer to the value specified.

actions.name: Global Set...
actions.description: Set the global flag. Global flags are named in the file Globals.ini. Global flags can be either 'on/set/true' or 'off/clear/false'.

actions.name: Global Clear...
actions.description: Clear the global flag. Global flags are named in the file Globals.ini. Global flags can either be 'on/set/true' or 'off/clear/false'.

actions.name: Auto Base Building...
actions.description: Initialize the skirmish mode's AI build control to either 'on' or 'off' state. When 'on'%1 the AI takes over as if it were in skirmish mode as long as it has a Construction Yard.

actions.name: Grow shroud one step
actions.description: Increase the shroud darkness by one step.

actions.name: Destroy attached object
actions.description: Destroy any buildings%1 bridges%1 or units that this trigger is attached to.

actions.name: Add 1-time Superweapon...
actions.description: Add the specified one-shot Superweapon to the trigger's owning House.

actions.name: Add repeating Superweapon...
actions.description: Add the specified Superweapon permanently to the trigger's owning House.

actions.name: Preferred target...
actions.description: Specify what the trigger's owning House should use as its preferred target when using Superweapon attacks with the Offensive targeting setting.

actions.name: All change House...
actions.description: All objects of the trigger's owning House change ownership to the specified House.

actions.name: Make ally...
actions.description: Cause the trigger's owning House to ally with the specified House.

actions.name: Make enemy...
actions.description: Cause the trigger's owning House to break the alliance with the specified House.

actions.name: Change Zoom Level...
actions.description: Changes the zoom out level of the Player's radar map. Use 1 for normal view%1 2 for zoomed out.

actions.name: Resize Player View...
actions.description: Changes the Player's viewing rectangle into the map.  Enter as:   x%1y%1w%1h   where x%1y gives the upper left corner and w%1h give the width and height.

actions.name: Play Anim at...
actions.description: Plays the specified anim in the specified cell.

actions.name: Do Explosion with Weapon at...
actions.description: Creates an explosion in the specified cell%1 using the warhead from the weapon specified by its index.

actions.name: Meteor strike at...
actions.description: Sends a single meteor at the specified cell.

actions.name: Start Ion Storm...
actions.description: Starts an ion storm sequence to run for the specified number of game frames.

actions.name: Stop Ion Storm..
actions.description: End an Ion storm in progress.

actions.name: Lock input
actions.description: Disables user input.

actions.name: Unlock input
actions.description: Enables user input.

actions.name: Center Camera at Waypoint...
actions.description: Moves the tactical view to the specified Waypoint.

actions.name: Zoom in
actions.description: Zooms the tactical map in.

actions.name: Zoom out
actions.description: Zooms the tactical map out.

actions.name: Reshroud Map
actions.description: Reshrouds the entire map.

actions.name: Change Light Behavior
actions.description: Changes the way a building spotlight behaves. Attach this trigger to a building that casts a spotlight.

actions.name: Enable Trigger
actions.description: Enables the target trigger.

actions.name: Disable Trigger
actions.description: Disables the target trigger.

actions.name: Create Radar Event
actions.description: Creates a radar event at the specified Waypoint.

actions.name: Local Set...
actions.description: Set the local flag. Local flags can be either 'on/set/true' or 'off/clear/false'.

actions.name: Local Clear...
actions.description: Clear the local flag. Local flags can either be 'on/set/true' or 'off/clear/false'.

actions.name: Meteor Shower at...
actions.description: Creates a meteor shower around the specified Waypoint.

actions.name: Reduce Tiberium at...
actions.description: Reduces Tiberium around the specified Waypoint.

actions.name: Sell building
actions.description: Sells the building attached to this trigger.

actions.name: Turn off building
actions.description: Turns off the building attached to this trigger.

actions.name: Turn on building
actions.description: Turns on the building attached to this trigger.

actions.name: Apply 100 damage at...
actions.description: Applies 100 points of damage using the C4Warhead at the specified Waypoint.

actions.name: Light flash small at...
actions.description: Shows a small light flash at location.

actions.name: Light flash medium at...
actions.description: Shows a medium light flash at location.

actions.name: Light flash large at...
actions.description: Shows a large light flash at location.

actions.name: Announce Win
actions.description: Announce that the Player has won.

actions.name: Announce Lose
actions.description: Announce that the Player has lost.

actions.name: Force End
actions.description: Force the end of scenario.

actions.name: Destroy Tag...
actions.description: Destroys the tag and all attached triggers.

actions.name: Set ambient step...
actions.description: Sets ambient light fade step value.

actions.name: Set ambient rate...
actions.description: Sets ambient light fade rate.

actions.name: Set ambient light...
actions.description: Fades ambient light to new lighting level.

actions.name: AI triggers begin...
actions.description: Starts AI triggers for the specified House.

actions.name: AI triggers stop...
actions.description: Stops AI triggers for the specified House.

actions.name: Ratio of AI trigger teams...
actions.description: AI percentage of teams created for AI triggers (100 = all for AI trigger teams%1 0 = all for regular teams).

actions.name: Ratio of team aircraft...
actions.description: AI percentage of aircraft created for teams (100 = all for teams%1 0 = all random).

actions.name: Ratio of team infantry...
actions.description: AI percentage of infantry created for teams (100 = all for teams%1 0 = all random).

actions.name: Ratio of team units...
actions.description: AI percentage of units created for teams (100 = all for teams%1 0 = all random).

actions.name: Reinforcement Team at Waypoint...
actions.description: Create reinforcement team at special Waypoint location.

actions.name: Wake up self
actions.description: Breaks out of sleep or harmless mode so as to enter guard mode.

actions.name: Wake up all sleepers
actions.description: Breaks all units out of sleep mode.

actions.name: Wake up all harmless
actions.description: Breaks all out of harmless mode.

actions.name: Wake up group...
actions.description: Breaks all units of the specified group out of sleep mode.

actions.name: Vein growth...
actions.description: Controls if veins grow or not.

actions.name: Tiberium growth...
actions.description: Controls if Tiberium grows or not.

actions.name: Ice growth...
actions.description: Controls if ice grows or not.

actions.name: Particle Anim at...
actions.description: Shows particle animation at the specified location.

actions.name: Remove Particle Anim at...
actions.description: Deletes particle anims at the specified location.

actions.name: Lightning strike at...
actions.description: Sends a single Ion Storm lightning strike at the specified location.

actions.name: Turn Berserk
actions.description: Attached object%1 who must be Cyborg=yes%1 goes berserk.

actions.name: Activate AI Blasticade
actions.description: Turns on the specified AI House's Blasticade defense.

actions.name: Deactivate AI Blasticade
actions.description: Turns off the specified AI House's Blasticade defense.

actions.name: Ion Cannon strike...
actions.description: Fires an Ion Cannon at the specified Waypoint.

actions.name: Tactical Nuke strike...
actions.description: Fires a Tactical Nuke at the specified Waypoint.

actions.name: Chem Missile strike...
actions.description: Fires a Chemical Missile at the specified Waypoint.

actions.name: Toggle Train Cargo
actions.description: Toggles state of cargo train dropping Crate.

actions.name: Play Sound Effect anywhere...
actions.description: Plays sound effect at random Waypoint.

actions.name: Play Sound Effect at...
actions.description: Plays sound effect specified at Waypoint specified.

actions.name: Play Sidebar Movie...
actions.description: Displays the specified movie in the sidebar. Player still has control of interface and units.

actions.name: Reshroud Map at...
actions.description: Does an anti-map ping at Waypoint specified.

actions.name: Lightning Storm at...
actions.description: Lightning storm owned by owner of trigger at Waypoint.

actions.name: Timer Text...
actions.description: Display the text identified by the string file's entry label with the timer.

actions.name: Flash Team...
actions.description: Flashes the specified team for the specified number of frames.

actions.name: Talk Bubble...
actions.description: Displays talk bubble over unit.

actions.name: Set Tech Level for TechType...
actions.description: Sets the specified TechType's requirements to the specified tech level.

actions.name: Reinforcement by Chronosphere...
actions.description: Teleport reinforcement team to special Waypoint location.

actions.name: Create Goodie Crate at...
actions.description: Create a Goodie Crate with specific contents at a Waypoint.

actions.name: Iron Curtain at...
actions.description: Iron Curtain Super effect at Waypoint.

actions.name: Pause Game for # seconds...
actions.description: This will pause the game for the specified seconds.

actions.name: Evict Occupiers
actions.description: This Action will evict all occupiers from the attached Building.

actions.name: Jump Camera at Waypoint...
actions.description: Moves the tactical view to a specified Waypoint instantly.

actions.name: Make Side Cheer...
actions.description: Will make all infantry who aren't busy do their cheer animation.

actions.name: Set Tab to (0-3)...
actions.description: Forces the sidebar to switch to the desired tab%1 0 for Buildings%1 1 for Armory%1 2 for Infantry and 3 for Units.

actions.name: Flash Cameo...
actions.description: Flashes the Cameo for this TechType for this long in frames%1 15 frames equals 1 ingame second.

actions.name: Stop Sounds at...
actions.description: Stops all sounds at Waypoint that were started using the 'Play Sound at' trigger.

actions.name: Play Sidebar Movie and pause...
actions.description: Displays the specified movie in the sidebar. Game pauses while the movie is playing. Player has no control during the movie.

actions.name: Clear all Smudges
actions.description: Deletes all Smudge objects from the map.

actions.name: Destroy all of...
actions.description: Kills everything of the specified House.

actions.name: Destroy all Buildings of...
actions.description: Kills all buildings of the specified House.

actions.name: Destroy all Land Units of...
actions.description: Kills all land units of the specified House.

actions.name: Destroy all Naval Units of...
actions.description: Kills all naval units of the specified House.

actions.name: Mind Control Base of...
actions.description: The trigger's owning House will mind control the specified House's base.

actions.name: Restore Mind-Controlled Base to...
actions.description: The trigger's owning House will give all buildings that belonged to the specified House back to it.

actions.name: Create Building at...
actions.description: The trigger's owning House will gain this type of building at this Waypoint. Overlays will be cleared and units moved away.

actions.name: Restore Starting TechTypes of...
actions.description: All buildings and units the specified House had at the start of the game will be recreated. Will move units away and erase Overlays.

actions.name: Chrono Screen Effect for...
actions.description: Will tile the screen with the full screen chrono effect for this many frames%1 15 frames equals 1 ingame second.

actions.name: Teleport All to...
actions.description: All Units of the trigger's owning House will teleport to Waypoint.

actions.name: Set Superweapon Charge...
actions.description: The trigger's owning House will have this Superweapon charged to this percent%1 if they have the Superweapon building. Takes an int (0-100).

actions.name: Restore Starting Buildings of...
actions.description: All buildings the specified House had at the start of the game will be healed or recreated. Will move units away and erase Overlays.

actions.name: Flash Buildings of Type...
actions.description: All buildings of this type owned by the trigger's owning House will flash for this many frames%1 15 frames equals 1 ingame second

actions.name: Superweapon Set Recharge Time...
actions.description: Changes the time in frames this Superweapon takes to charge the next time it is reset%1 set%1 or fired%1 15 frames equals 1 ingame second.

actions.name: Superweapon Reset Recharge Time...
actions.description: Changes the time in frames this Superweapon takes to charge back to normal%1 15 frames equals 1 ingame second.

actions.name: Superweapon Reset...
actions.description: Resets a Superweapon as if a spy had gotten in.

actions.name: Preferred Target Cell Set...
actions.description: The trigger's owning House will aim all future targetable Superweapons at this Waypoint.

actions.name: Preferred Target Cell Clear
actions.description: The trigger's owning House will go back to targeting its Superweapons normally.

actions.name: Center Base Cell Set...
actions.description: The trigger's owning House will consider the center of its base to be this Waypoint.

actions.name: Center Base Cell Clear
actions.description: The trigger's owning House will go back to computing its center.

actions.name: Blackout Radar...
actions.description: The trigger's owning House will have a radar blackout for this many frames%1 15 frames equals 1 ingame second.

actions.name: Force Shield Target Cell Set...
actions.description: The trigger's owning House will aim all future Force Shields at this Waypoint.

actions.name: Force Shield Target Cell Clear
actions.description: The trigger's owning House will go back to targeting its Force Shields normally.

actions.name: Retint Red...
actions.description: Retints the Red portion of the screen.

actions.name: Retint Green...
actions.description: Retints the Green portion of the screen.

actions.name: Retint Blue...
actions.description: Retints the Blue portion of the screen.

actions.name: Jump camera home
actions.description: Returns home%1 just like hitting the default 'H' key.

actions.name: Add auxiliary power for a House...
actions.description: Adds an amount of auxiliary power for specified House. Amount can be negative.

actions.name: Kill drivers of attached units
actions.description: Kills the drivers of all units that this trigger is attached to%1 resulting in the units changing House to the one specified.

actions.name: Set EVA voice...
actions.description: Sets the Player's EVA voice. Use 0%1 1%1 2 and 3 for Allied%1 Soviet%1 Epsilon and Foehn respectively. Use -1 to disable EVA completely.

actions.name: Set group...
actions.description: Sets the group for the object that this trigger is attached to.
